name: CosmoAr2D
description:
First game from indy company Fading Ind.

Action buttons:

"W" - Move Up

"S" - Move Down

"A" - Move Left

"D" - Move Right

Also you can pause this game, using this buttons: "P" and "Esc"

Also we added restart function on button "R".

We hope, you'll enjoy our first game! And we are open to criticism
